basics.name: Ashraf Isaacs
basics.label: Experienced Installation Technician with a demonstrated history of working in the telecommunications & Fibre industry. Skilled in Microsoft Excel, Network Troubleshooting, Wireless Access Points, Splicing, Cabling, and Microsoft Word. Strong engineering professional with a NCV Level 4 focused in Information Technology And Computer Science from College of Cape Town.
